products.name: Rowing Machine
products.description: A high-quality Rowing Machine designed to provide a comprehensive full-body workout experience. Its smooth and adjustable resistance levels cater to various fitness levels, allowing users to effectively engage their muscles and improve cardiovascular endurance. Compact and user-friendly, this Rowing Machine offers a convenient and efficient way to enhance your fitness routine from the comfort of your own home.

products.name: Yoga
products.description: Yoga is a physical, mental, and spiritual practice that originated in ancient India. It includes a combination of physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation techniques to promote physical and mental well-being.

products.name: Zumba
products.description: Zumba is a high-energy fitness dance class that combines Latin and international music with dance moves. It is a fun and effective way to improve cardiovascular fitness and burn calories.

products.name: Weightlifting
products.description: Weightlifting, also known as strength training or resistance training, involves lifting weights to build and tone muscles. It is an effective way to increase strength and muscle mass.

products.name: Cardiovascular Exercise
products.description: Cardiovascular exercises, such as running, cycling, and swimming, are designed to improve heart and lung health. They are great for burning calories and increasing endurance.

products.name: Pilates
products.description: Pilates is a low-impact exercise method that focuses on strengthening the core muscles, improving flexibility, and enhancing body awareness. It is suitable for all fitness levels.

products.name: Protein Powder
products.description: Whey protein powder for muscle recovery and growth.

products.name: Multivitamins

products.name: Creatine Monohydrate

products.name: Probiotics
